channel.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed
channel.description: A daily digest of curated Latin American news.

item.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed - September 25, 2025
item.author: LatAm Prompt News Feed
item.description:
Milei Fixed Half of Argentina’s Inflation Problem. He Needs Help With the Rest. — The Wall Street Journal

The country’s central bank no longer prints money to finance deficits, but a run on the currency could still cause prices to surge.

US support is only a temporary fix for Argentina — The Financial Times

After some initial success, Javier Milei’s chainsaw seems to have sputtered

How to exorcise Argentina’s economic demons — The Financial Times

American support alone is insufficient for Milei to ensure the country’s stability

Opinion | Bolivia’s Chance to Rejoin the World — The Wall Street Journal

With years of socialist rule coming to an end, the country can finally repair relations with the United States.
